entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
